entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 1:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
